name: Retro Snake (itch) (David Vereb)
description:
Simple retro-looking snake game I developed on Godot Engine in a weekend.

I really enjoyed replicating this nostalgic game, although I thought it would be easy, this game is much more complex than it seems. But I finally managed to understand its logic with some math. 

I post it hoping someone can have a good time with it  :)

(Maybe I'll add some more music in the future).
